channel.title: Site mapping on open-archaeo
channel.description: Recent content in Site mapping on open-archaeo

item.title: archaeological-survey-location-collector
item.description: An app for use in archaeological field survey to collect high-accurate point locations, photographs, and other data.

item.title: ArkGrid
item.description: A QGIS plugin for local site grids.

item.title: ArkScan
item.description: A simple gui app to simplify scanning single context plans.

item.title: ArkSpatial
item.description: A QGIS plugin to simplfy digitization of archaeological plans drawn using the Museum of London Single Context Recording methodology.

item.title: field-photographs
item.description: Android apps for archaeology that enable photography during field work.

item.title: fieldwalkr
item.description: Spatial Sampling and Survey Simulation Tools.

item.title: input
item.description: Makes surveying geospatial data easy by designing your survey project in QGIS with custom forms.

item.title: sdr33_triangulation
item.description: Reads an SDR33 data logger file and using the angular observations recorded therein to triangulate the position of points of interest.

item.title: simple-browser-gis-collector
item.description: Mobile-oriented browser based application that could be used for data collection.

item.title: sitedefinition
item.description: The goal of sitedefinition is to see how feature densities might be used for site definition.

item.title: Tachy2GIS_arch
item.description: QGIS plugin for documentation of archaeological features using Tachy2GIS.
